column2: It came to me. My own. My love...  My preciousness.
column3: Lost! Lost! My Precious is lost!!
column6: The thieves. The thieves. The filthy little thieves. Where is it?
column7: Where is it? They stole it from us. My precious. Curse them, we hates them! It’s ours, it is, and we wants it!
column8: It burns! It burns us! It freezes! Nasty Elves twisted it. Take it off us!
column9: No! That would kill us! Kill us!
column10: We be nice to them if they be nice to us. Take it off us.
column11: We swears to do what you wants. We swears.
column12: We swears to serve the master of the precious. We will swear on the...on the precious.  Gollum. Gollum.
column13: Yes...on the precious. On the precious.
column16: No! We won’t go back. Not there. Not to him. They can’t make us.  Gollum! Gollum!
column17: No. Ashes and dust and thirst there is, and pits, pits, pits.
column18: And Orcses, thousands of Orcses. And always the Great Eye watching, watching.
column20: See? See? We have led you out. Hurry, Hobbitses. Hurry!
column23: Come, Hobbits, come. We go quickly.
column24: No, no birdses to eat. No crunchable birdses.
column25: We are famished! Yes! Famished we are, precious!
column28: It tries to chokes us! We can’t eats Hobbit food! We must starve!
column29: Oh, cruel Hobbit. It does not care if we be hungry. Does not care if we should die.
column33: Once it takes hold of us, it never lets go.
column34: All dead. All rotten. Elves and Men and Orcses. A great battle long ago.
column35: Dead Marshes. Yes. Yes, that is their name.  This way. Don’t follow the lights.
column37: Or Hobbits go down to join the dead ones and light little candles of their own.
column41: Master should be resting. Master needs to keep up his strength.
column42: Mustn’t ask us. Not its business.  Gollum. Gollum.
column43: Cold be heart and hand and bone Cold be travelers far from home
column44: They do not see what lies ahead, when sun has failed and moon is dead.
column48: Quick! They will see us! They will see us!
column49: Dead? No, you cannot kill them. No.
column51: They are calling for it. They are calling for the precious.
column52: Hurry, Hobbits. The Black Gate is very close.
column54: Master says to show him the way into Mordor. So good Sméagol does, master says so.
column57: They catch you! They catch you!
column59: He wants the precious. Always he is looking for it. And the precious is wanting to go back to him.  But we mustn’t let him have it.
column60: No! There’s another way. There’s another way. More secret. A dark way.
column62: Yes. There’s a path...and some stairs... and then...a tunnel.
column64: We wants it. We needs it.
column65: Must have the precious. They stole it from us. Sneaky little Hobbitses. Wicked. Tricksy. False.
column66: Yes, precious. False. They will cheat you, hurt you, lie!
column67: You don’t have any friends. Nobody likes you.
column68: You’re a liar and a thief.
column71: Where would you be without me?  Gollum. Gollum. I saved us. It was me. We survived because of me.
column75: Look. Look. See what Sméagol finds?
column77: They are tender. They are nice. Yes, they are. Eat them. Eat them!
column78: What’s he doing? Stupid, fat Hobbit. It ruins it.
column79: What’s taters, precious? What’s taters? Eh?
column80: Oh, yes, we could. Spoil a nice fish.
column81: Give it to us raw and wriggling. You keep nasty chips.
column82: Wicked Men. Servants of Sauron. They are called to Mordor. The Dark One is gathering all armies to him. It won’t be long now. He will soon be ready.
column83: To make his war. The last war that will cover all the world in Shadow.
column86: Sméagol. Why does it cry, Sméagol?
column89: Filthy little Hobbitses. They stole it from us!
column93: It is the only way. Master says we must go to Mordor, so we must try.
column95: No, no, no hard feelings.  Gollum, Gollum. Yes, master.
column98: Master betrayed us. Wicked. Tricksy. False. We ought to wring his filthy little neck. Kill him! Kill him! Kill them both. And then we take the precious and we be the master!
column99: Then we stabs them out. Put out his eyeses and make him crawl.
column101: We could let her do it.
column102: Yes, precious, she could. And then we takes it once they’re dead.
column105: It’s mine! My own. It came to me.
column106: Wake up! Wake up! Wake up, sleepies! We must go, yes, we must go at once!
column107: Come on, must go, no time...
column109: Come, Hobbitses. Very close now. Very close to Mordor! No safe places here. Hurry! Shhh.
column111: What's it saying, my Precious, my love? Is Sméagol losing his nerve??
column112: And we will ... Sméagol did it once...  ... He can do it again.
column113: Patience, patience, my love. First, we must lead them to her.
column115: And when they go in, there's no coming out. She's always hungry, she always needs to feed. She must eat. All she gets is filthy Orcses.
column116: No ...not very nice at all, my love. She hungers for sweeter meats...
column117: “Hobbit meat.” And when She throws away the bones and the empty clothes, then we will find it...
column119: The Precious will be ours, once the Hobbitses are dead!
column121: The Dead City, very nasty place, full of ... enemies.
column122: Quick! Quick! They will see, they will see.
column125: Come, Hobbits. We climb - we must climb!
column126: Careful, Master - careful! Very far to fall. Very dangerous on the stairs.
column128: Why does he hates poor Sméagol? What has Sméagol ever done to him? Master?
column129: Sméagol? No, no, not poor Sméagol. Sméagol hates nasty Elf bread!
column130: What's this? Crumbs on his jacketses!  He took it! He took it! I seen him, he's always stuffing his face when Master's not looking!
column131: See! See! He wants it for himself.
column132: Master must go inside the tunnel.
column133: Orcses filth! Orcses come in here sometimes.
column136: You will see ... Oh, yes ... You will see.
column137: Naughty little fly, Why does it cry?
column138: Caught in her web, Soon you'll be... ...Eaten!
column139: Got away did it, Precious? Not this time, not this time!
column140: Clever Hobbits to climb so high!
